name: 0xCOFFEE JHB
body:
Next Meetup:
1pm on 14 June 2014 at Wolves 

News:

Follow us on Twitter:

Coming Up:

0xC0FFEE Cape Town is an off-shoot from ZaCon (a South African Hacker Conference), aiming to connect the hacker community in Cape Town.
Our meetups tend to be more social in nature, though we do try and ensure a relevant topic of discussion to encourage learning.
Attendance is free and open to all - regardless of skill level or experience.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
